languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт с некоторым удивлением смотрит на вас, а затем осторожно отвечает:{/n} "{name}... Наши народы слишком разнятся между собой. То, что трогает наши души, вряд ли произведет больше впечатление на твоих сородичей. Как и я нахожу неуклюжей и примитивной вашу концепцию принесения вещественных даров".

{n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт с некоторым удивлением смотрит на вас, а затем осторожно отвечает:{/n} "{name}... Наши народы слишком разнятся между собой. То, что трогает наши души, вряд ли произведет больше впечатление на твоих сородичей. Как и я нахожу неуклюжей и примитивной вашу концепцию принесения вещественных даров".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira ligeramente sorprendida, y luego responde con cautela:{/n} «{name}... nuestras especies son demasiado distintas. Lo que a nosotros nos llega al alma es poco probable que cause alguna impresión en la vuestra. Al igual que considero primitiva y torpe la idea de ofrecer regalos materiales».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira ligeramente sorprendida, y luego responde con cautela:{/n} «{name}... nuestras especies son demasiado distintas. Lo que a nosotros nos llega al alma es poco probable que cause alguna impresión en la vuestra. Al igual que considero primitiva y torpe la idea de ofrecer regalos materiales».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは少し驚いたようにこちらを見て、慎重に返事をする。{/n}「{name}…我とお前の種族はあまりにもかけ離れている。我々の心の琴線に触れるものだとしても、お前の種族にはまったく響かないかもしれない。お前たちの物質的な贈り物を提供するという概念が、我には不器用かつ原始的だと感じるのと同じように」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは少し驚いたようにこちらを見て、慎重に返事をする。{/n}「{name}…我とお前の種族はあまりにもかけ離れている。我々の心の琴線に触れるものだとしても、お前の種族にはまったく響かないかもしれない。お前たちの物質的な贈り物を提供するという概念が、我には不器用かつ原始的だと感じるのと同じように」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特有些惊讶地看着你，随后小心翼翼地回答道。{/n}“{name}……我们之间的物种差别太大了。能够触及我们灵魂的事物，在你的族群眼中似乎不值一提，正如你们赠送物质礼物的习俗在我眼中既笨拙、又原始一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特有些惊讶地看着你，随后小心翼翼地回答道。{/n}“{name}……我们之间的物种差别太大了。能够触及我们灵魂的事物，在你的族群眼中似乎不值一提，正如你们赠送物质礼物的习俗在我眼中既笨拙、又原始一样。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous regarde d'un air un peu surpris, puis répond prudemment :{/n} « {name}... Nos espèces sont trop différentes. Ce qui touche nos âmes a peu de chances de faire une quelconque impression sur celles de vos semblables, tout comme je trouve le principe d'offrandes matérielles aussi maladroit que primitif. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous regarde d'un air un peu surpris, puis répond prudemment :{/n} « {name}... Nos espèces sont trop différentes. Ce qui touche nos âmes a peu de chances de faire une quelconque impression sur celles de vos semblables, tout comme je trouve le principe d'offrandes matérielles aussi maladroit que primitif. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich leicht überrascht an und antwortet dann vorsichtig:{/n} "{name} ... Unsere Spezies sind zu unterschiedlich. Was unsere Seelen berührt, wird auf Euresgleichen vermutlich keinen großen Eindruck machen. Genau, wie ich Euren Brauch, materielle Geschenke zu überreichen, unbeholfen und primitiv finde."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich leicht überrascht an und antwortet dann vorsichtig:{/n} "{name} ... Unsere Spezies sind zu unterschiedlich. Was unsere Seelen berührt, wird auf Euresgleichen vermutlich keinen großen Eindruck machen. Genau, wie ich Euren Brauch, materielle Geschenke zu überreichen, unbeholfen und primitiv finde."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana hafif bir şaşkınlıkla bakıyor, ardından dikkatlice cevap veriyor.{/n} "{name}... Halklarımız, birbirlerinden bir hayli farklı. Bizim ruhumuza işleyen bir şeyin soydaşların üzerinde kayda değer bir etki yaratması pek olası değildir. Tıpkı maddi bir hediye verme kavramınızı görgüsüz ve ilkel bulmam gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you in slight surprise, then cautiously replies,{/n} "{name}... Our species are too different from one another. What touches our souls is unlikely to make a significant impression on your kind. Just as I find your concept of offering material gifts to be clumsy and primitive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, sana hafif bir şaşkınlıkla bakıyor. Ardından dikkatlice cevap veriyor.{/n} "{name}... Halklarımız, birbirlerinden bir hayli farklı. Bizim ruhumuza işleyen bir şeyin soydaşların üzerinde kayda değer bir etki yaratması pek olası değildir. Tıpkı maddi bir hediye verme kavramınızı görgüsüz ve ilkel bulmam gibi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
